scripts.dev:server:mock-ai: cd server && USE_MOCK_AI=true bun run dev
scripts.dev:server:mock-ai:dynamic: cd server && USE_MOCK_AI=true MOCK_AI_RECEIPT_FILE=$FILE bun run dev
scripts.dev:client:mock-ai: cd client && VITE_MOCK_AI=true bun run dev
scripts.dev:mock-ai: concurrently "bun run dev:shared" "FILE=$FILE bun run dev:server:mock-ai:dynamic" "FILE=$FILE bun run dev:client:mock-ai"
scripts.dev: concurrently "bun run dev:shared" "bun run dev:server" "bun run dev:client"
scripts.build: bun run build:shared && bun run build:server && bun run build:client
scripts.build:single: bun run build && bun run copy:static && bun run build:server
scripts.postinstall: bun run build:shared && bun run build:server
